sharedRegions

Class DepartureTerminalEntrance

  • java.lang.Object
    • sharedRegions.DepartureTerminalEntrance
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DTEPassenger

    public class DepartureTerminalEntrance
extends java.lang.Object
implements DTEPassenger
    Implementation of the Departure Terminal Entrance Shared Memory The Passengers arrive here and wait other passengers to reach final state so they can progress.

      • setAllPassengersFinished

        public void setAllPassengersFinished(boolean allPassengersFinished)
        Setter to all passenger finished. If all passenger are finished notifies all threads.
        Parameters:
        allPassengersFinished - True if all the passengers have arrived to the exit zones.
